resources.string: Smart Flasher is a simple app aimed to make flashing recovery zips much easier.
Backup Boot partition of your device into %s\n
Failed to get Boot Partition identity

- Updated SDK to 29 (Android Q).

- About: gradle: Updated build tools and dependencies.

- Flasher: Updated Reboot and ShutDown.

- About: Integrate License view with the main *SP* icon.

- Miscellaneous changes.
\nIf you like to appreciate my work, please consider donating to me as it is helpful to continue my projects more active, although it is not at all necessary.\n
\nPlease note: I can accept donations either via PayPal, or through SmartPack Donation Package in PlayStore.\n
Want to appreciate my work with a Donation? Click here
Failed to get data from external file manager
The size of %s is bigger than 100 MB.\n\nPlease Note: Due to safety reasons, recovery files of more than 100 MB won\'t be allowed to flash.
Click the flash button to select and flash a recovery ZIP file without rebooting into custom recovery. The changes will be applied after a reboot.
Warning: Flashing a wrong 'img' file likely brick your device. Please be careful.
Click to get the details of last flashing

\nYour device will be rebooted into Download Mode.\n
\nYour device will be rebooted into Recovery mode.\n

Cache/Dalvik Cache partitions of your device will be erased.

Attention! The device will be Rebooted.

Data partition of your device will be completely erased.

Warning! You will lose all the user data including apps.

Attention! The device will be Rebooted.
